description: Set up foundational TanStack Start project with TypeScript, Hebrew RTL support, and Supabase integration

tasks.title: Create TanStack Start project with TypeScript
tasks.description: Initialize a new TanStack Start project using the official starter template with TypeScript configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `npm create @tanstack/router@latest` or equivalent TanStack Start init command - exits with code 0
tasks.notes: Project created manually from TanStack Start basic example. Package @tanstack/react-start (correct name) installed. tsconfig.json has strict: true. npm run build succeeds.

tasks.title: Verify dev server starts successfully
tasks.description: Confirm the development server runs without errors after project creation.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `npm run dev` - server starts without error
tasks.notes: Dev server started successfully on port 3000. Browser test confirmed page loads with status 200 showing 'GuardianGate' title and Hebrew text. agent-browser installation successful.

tasks.title: Verify production build completes
tasks.description: Ensure the project builds successfully for production deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `npm run build` - exits with code 0
Run `npm run typecheck` - exits with code 0 (if script exists)

tasks.title: Update index route with GuardianGate text
tasks.description: Modify the default index route to display the project name.
acceptanceCriteria: agent-browser: open http://localhost:3000 - text 'GuardianGate' visible on page

tasks.title: Configure HTML with RTL and Hebrew lang attributes
tasks.description: Set the document-level RTL direction and Hebrew language attribute.
acceptanceCriteria: Root HTML template or layout file contains `dir="rtl"`
Root HTML template or layout file contains `lang="he"`
Run `npm run typecheck` - exits with code 0

tasks.title: Add Hebrew font (Heebo) to the project
tasks.description: Load the Heebo font from Google Fonts for Hebrew text rendering.
acceptanceCriteria: Google Fonts link for Heebo present in HTML head OR @font-face rule in CSS
Font rule includes `font-display: swap` for performance

tasks.title: Add test Hebrew text to index page
tasks.description: Add Hebrew text to verify RTL rendering works correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: agent-browser: open http://localhost:3000 - Hebrew text visible
agent-browser: screenshot tmp/hebrew-rtl.png - text aligned to right side

tasks.title: Install Supabase client package
tasks.description: Add the Supabase JavaScript client library to the project.

tasks.title: Create environment variable files
tasks.description: Set up .env.example with Supabase placeholders and ensure .env is gitignored.

tasks.title: Create Supabase client utility file
tasks.description: Create the typed Supabase client initialization file.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `npm run typecheck` - exits with code 0

tasks.title: Set up Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Install and configure Tailwind CSS for styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer` - exits with code 0
Global CSS file contains Tailwind directives (@tailwind base, components, utilities)

tasks.title: Configure Tailwind RTL plugin
tasks.description: Add RTL support to Tailwind configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `npm install -D tailwindcss-rtl` OR verify Tailwind v3.3+ logical properties work
Tailwind config includes RTL plugin OR uses logical property utilities
Run `npm run typecheck` - exits with code 0

tasks.title: Create root layout component with RTL styles
tasks.description: Build the root layout with proper HTML structure and RTL-aware base styles.
acceptanceCriteria: Layout includes Heebo font family in body styles
agent-browser: open http://localhost:3000 - no console errors

tasks.title: Define CSS color scheme variables
tasks.description: Set up CSS custom properties for the color scheme.
acceptanceCriteria: Global CSS file contains `:root` with CSS custom properties
Colors are accessible (can be placeholder values for now)

tasks.title: Create project directory structure
tasks.description: Set up the folder structure for future feature development.

File specifies Node.js version if needed
